code: import axios from'axios';import authHeader from'./auth-header';var API_URL='https://esport-station-71297.herokuapp.com/';var upload=function upload(file,onUploadProgress){var formData=new FormData();formData.append("file",file);return axios.post(API_URL+"/upload",formData,{headers:{"Content-Type":"multipart/form-data"},onUploadProgress:onUploadProgress});};var getFiles=function getFiles(){return axios.get(API_URL+"/files");};export default{upload:upload,getFiles:getFiles};
